if he had her tied up the whole time?
Can't you just be happy your wife is home and safe?
translation.it: Non può essere solo felice che sia tornata?

translation.en: Amy, we found your diary.
It contains many concerning allegations of mental and physical abuse.
translation.it: Contiene molte accuse di abusi fisici e psicologici.

translation.en: Well, it's the ugly truth.
Nick didn't want a baby.
He has a temper. We had money problems.
translation.it: Si arrabbia facilmente. Avevamo problemi finanziari.

translation.en: But I love him.
Then why did you try to buy a gun?
translation.it: Allora perché voleva comprare una pistola?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I feel myself fading.
If I could just clarify one thing--
If this case had been left in your deeply incompetent hands...
translation.it: Se questo caso fosse rimasto nelle vostre mani incompetenti,

translation.en: my husband would be on death row...
translation.it: mio marito ora sarebbe condannato a morte

translation.en: and I'd be tied, still, spread-eagle...
translation.it: e io sarei ancora legata mani e piedi...

translation.en: Ms. Dunne, you've been very brave. We're finished.
translation.it: Sig.ra Dunne, è stata molto coraggiosa. Abbiamo finito.

translation.en: Now, I have to ask you...
do you feel safe going home with your husband?
translation.it: se non la preoccupa tornare a casa con suo marito.

translation.en: We prayed to God, and God has answered our prayers.
translation.it: Abbiamo pregato e Dio ha risposto alle nostre preghiere.

translation.en: Amy Dunne is home.
Now, I know there are a lot of questions and concerns...
translation.it: So che avete tante domande e dubbi,

translation.en: but for right now, we wanna sit tight...
and just be thankful and grateful... for this miracle on the Mississippi.
translation.it: e ringraziare per questo miracolo avvenuto sul Mississippi.

translation.en: Excuse me. Excuse us, folks.
WOMAN: We love you, Amy!
All right, you can stop pretending now.
I'm not pretending.
You were perfect.
The Nick I saw on TV, that's the Nick I fell in love with.
translation.it: Il Nick che ho visto in TV era quello che amavo.

translation.en: You do know I was just telling you... what you wanted to hear, right?
translation.it: Ma stavo dicendo quello che volevi sentire.

translation.en: That's how well you know me.
You know me in your marrow.
Okay.
You need to tell me exactly what happened.
Take off your clothes.
I need to make sure you're not wearing a wire.
translation.it: Devo assicurarmi che tu non abbia un microfono.

translation.en: You killed someone, Amy. You're a murderer.
translation.it: Hai ucciso un uomo, Amy. Sei un'assassina.

translation.en: I'm a fighter.
I fought my way back to you.
translation.it: E ho combattuto per tornare da te.

translation.en: You killed a guy.
You slashed his throat with a box cutter.
You went on national television... and begged for me to save your life.
translation.it: Ti sei fatto intervistare in TV pregandomi di salvarti la vita.

translation.en: And I obliged.
But I want that Nick.
I'm leaving.
You really think that's smart?
Shampoo.
Wounded, raped wife battles her way back to her husband...
translation.it: Donna ferita e stuprata lotta per tornare dal marito

translation.en: and he deserts her.
They'll destroy you.
Neighbors will shun you.
And I'll make sure that no one forgets the pain you caused me.
translation.it: E io farei sì che nessuno dimentichi quanto mi hai fatto soffrire.

translation.en: I don't want anything to do with your groupies outside.
translation.it: Non mi interessano i tuoi fan.

translation.en: Once they go...
I go.
Give it the night. Sleep on it.
Was there ever a baby?
There can be.
Good night.
MAN: Hey, Nick!
translation.it: 5 AGOSTO UN GIORNO A CASA Ciao, Nick!

translation.en: Hello, handsome.
Crepe?
Sure.
ELLEN: (ON TV) She was his dream girl.
translation.it: Era la donna dei suoi sogni.

translation.en: And when this spoiled, rich, entitled little boy couldn't have her...
translation.it: E quando quel figlio di papà viziato non ha potuto averla,

translation.en: he took her.
translation.it: se l'è presa con la forza.

translation.en: You must be so proud.
It's been four hours.
Nick? Nick? What's next for you and Amy?
translation.it: Nick? Nick? Che progetti avete tu e Amy?

translation.en: Right now, it's all about our marriage.
translation.it: Al momento ci concentreremo sul nostro matrimonio.

translation.en: When two people love each other and can't make that work...
translation.it: Due persone che si amano e non riescono a far funzionare le cose...

translation.en: that's the real tragedy.
(QUIETLY) Kiss my cheek.
I can't believe that fucking spider is America's sweetheart.
translation.it: La fidanzatina d'America è una serpe. 9 AGOSTO DA CINQUE GIORNI A CASA

translation.en: She told me she killed Desi.
translation.it: Ha ammesso di aver ucciso Desi.

translation.en: Not self-defense. Murder.
GO: Can't we get a wire? NICK: That's not gonna work.
She told you once before.
Yeah, because she had me strip naked, and stand in the shower.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto spogliare e portato nella doccia.

translation.en: I swear, you two are the most fucked-up people I've ever known.
translation.it: Voi due siete le due persone più schizzate che conosca.

translation.en: And I specialize in fucked-up.
You and Amy under the same roof?
translation.it: Tu e Amy sotto lo stesso tetto?

translation.en: You should pitch that as reality television.
REPORTER: (ON TV) Amy Dunne, and the Miracle on the Mississippi.
translation.it: Amy Dunne e il miracolo sul Mississippi.

translation.en: AMY: Nick and I have been through some bad patches.
translation.it: Io e Nick abbiamo passato dei brutti momenti.

translation.en: We've had our dark days.
But we thank you so much...
for supporting us in our new life together, for forgiving Nick.
translation.it: per sostenerci come coppia e per aver perdonato Nick.

translation.en: Really, your encouragement means the world.
translation.it: Il vostro incoraggiamento conta moltissimo per noi.

translation.en: Oh, she's good.
Amazing Amy and the Humbled Husband.
The Real Housewives of Branson.
Take care of this guy, will you?
I can't believe you're just leaving now.
You are not at risk anymore.
I'm the definition of "at risk."
You got a book deal, a Lifetime movie, you franchised The Bar.
translation.it: Scriverai un libro, gireranno un film su di voi e Il Bar ora è una catena.

translation.en: You may wanna thank her.
Just don't piss her off.
See you, guys.
Elvis has left Missouri.
She had to have made a mistake.
We need to check Amy's story, piece by piece.
translation.it: Dobbiamo verificare la sua storia, pezzo per pezzo.

translation.en: Nick, I can't do anything.
We had the national spotlight on us, we stained the rug.
translation.it: Il caso è di interesse nazionale. Non possiamo intervenire.

translation.en: The case is with the Feds now, they're done.
translation.it: I federali hanno indagato e concluso.

translation.en: That doesn't mean you have to be done.
It does.
What are you doing? (GASPS)
Couldn't sleep.
Come on...
let me tuck you back in.
You know you can sleep with me, right?
translation.it: Sai di poter dormire con me, vero?

translation.en: Yeah, it's just...
I need more time.
I would never, ever hurt you.
translation.it: Non ti farei mai del male.

translation.en: I do need you to participate, though.
I need you to do your part.
(WATER RUNNING) Okay.
Everything you have heard about my wife...
translation.it: 23 SETTEMBRE DA SETTE SETTIMANE A CASA Tutto ciò che avete sentito dire su mia moglie

translation.en: is a lie.
She is a calculating, murderous psychopath.
And I have been complicit--
AMY: Nick!
Nick? Breakfast.
Honey?
We should hold hands.
Not the entire time, but on and off throughout.
translation.it: Non sempre, ma di tanto in tanto.

translation.en: "So, Nick, how does it feel to have your wife back?"
translation.it: "Nick, com'è riavere sua moglie a casa?"

translation.en: "It's fantastic.
"How many people are lucky enough... "to get a second chance at love?"
translation.it: Quanti hanno una seconda possibilità di amare?"

translation.en: "Fantastic" is a little flippant.
"Amazing"?
I need you to admit that you got the credit cards...
translation.it: Dovrai ammettere di aver speso quei soldi,

translation.en: and that you hid all that stuff at Go's and that you pushed me.
translation.it: di aver nascosto quelle cose da Margo e di avermi spinta.

translation.en: I'm gonna need those three things to feel safe.
translation.it: In questo modo sarò al sicuro.

translation.en: You have to own this, Nick.
Don't worry. I know exactly what to say. (DOORBELL RINGS)
What a beautiful home.
I so appreciate you giving us this time, Nick.
translation.it: Grazie di aver accettato l'intervista, Nick.

translation.en: You went on national television...
translation.it: Lei ha dichiarato sulla TV nazionale

translation.en: and told people that I murdered my wife.
I go where the story goes.
translation.it: Facevo solo il mio lavoro. E che forse ho avuto rapporti carnali con mia sorella.

translation.en: You implied that I had carnal relations with my sister.
translation.it: E che forse ho avuto rapporti carnali con mia sorella.

translation.en: I didn't use the "I" word. I said you two were "extremely close."
translation.it: Non ho parlato di incesto. Ho solo detto che eravate "molto intimi".

translation.en: You and a panel of nitwits diagnosed me as a sociopath.
translation.it: Lei e quel gruppo di idioti mi avete definito un sociopatico.

translation.en: Ice-breaker.
To go with your robot dog.
I'll go find Amy.
She's downstairs.
What is it? It's for you.
Open it.
I don't need any more gifts from you.
translation.it: Non voglio altri regali da te.

translation.en: Open it.
I didn't touch you.
translation.it: Io non ti ho neanche toccata.

translation.en: You didn't need to.
Bullshit. That notice of disposal.
I have that. You threw it out.
The notice, yes.
I want a blood test.
I want a paternity test.
I love tests.
You can teach those people to hate me all you want.
translation.it: Puoi anche farmi odiare da tutti.

translation.en: I don't care. I am leaving you.
translation.it: Non mi importa. Io ti lascio.

translation.en: I won't have to teach your child to hate you.
translation.it: Non dovrò insegnare a tuo figlio a odiarti.

translation.en: He'll do that all by himself.
translation.it: Ti odierà senza il mio aiuto.

translation.en: You fucking cunt! (GRUNTS)
I'm the cunt you married.
The only time you liked yourself...
translation.it: Le uniche volte che ti piacevi

translation.it: erano quelle in cui cercavi di piacere a questa stronza.

translation.en: I'm not a quitter. I'm that cunt.
I've killed for you. Who else can say that?
translation.it: Ho ucciso per te. Chi altri può dire altrettanto?

translation.en: You think you would be happy with a nice Midwestern girl?
translation.it: Credi che una ragazza del Midwest ti farebbe felice?

translation.en: No way, baby. I'm it.
translation.it: No, tesoro. Solo io posso farti felice.

translation.en: Look, you're delusional. You're insane.
translation.it: Tu sei pazza. Sei fuori di testa.

translation.en: Why would you even want this?
Yes, I loved you.
translation.it: Sì, ti amavo, ma poi sono iniziate le prevaricazioni, il risentimento.

translation.en: And then all we did was resent each other, and try to control each other.
translation.it: ma poi sono iniziate le prevaricazioni, il risentimento.

translation.en: And cause each other pain.
That's marriage.
Now, I'm getting ready.
GO: I can't watch you play house with that thing for the next 18 years.
translation.it: Non posso sopportare che resti con lei per altri 18 anni.

translation.en: I can't just walk away.
You could get custody.
No, I won't. And you know it.
translation.it: Non lo farei, e lo sai.

translation.en: It's gonna be my child. I'm not gonna leave it.
translation.it: È mio figlio e non intendo abbandonarlo.

translation.en: You wanna stay.
I have a responsibility. It's not about what I want anymore.
translation.it: Ho delle responsabilità. Non conta più cosa voglio.

translation.en: You wanna stay with her.
You're breaking my heart.
Go, you're my voice of reason.

translation.en: I need you with me on this.

translation.en: Of course I'm with you.
I was with you before we were even born.

We've come out, united.

We're honest with each other.
Right?
We're partners in crime.
And?
And?
